tool_description: Build anime image card for share.
name: Bilibili Story Builder
title: Bilibili Story Builder

api_list.name: WorkTimes Check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bilibili-story-builder2.p.rapidapi.com/worktimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bilibili-story-builder2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
